sentences.english: We go up in the elevator.

sentences.finnish: Tämä kauppaa on auki ma-pe klo 9-20.
sentences.english: This store is open Monday to Friday from 9 am to 8 pm.
Come in! The door is open!

sentences.finnish: Meidän sauna on kellarissa. Kun menen saunaan, menen alas.
sentences.english: Our sauna is in the basement. When I go to the sauna, I go down.

sentences.finnish: Kun sataa ja tulee, meidän ikkunat ovat kiinni.
sentences.english: When it rains and is windy, our windows are closed.

sentences.finnish: Kun on lämmin ilma, haluan mennä ulos ja istua auringossa.
sentences.english: When the weather is warm, I want to go outside and sit in the sun.
